name: optimind-ai-ecosystem
description: Enterprise-grade AI ecosystem with 45+ AI tools and 35+ advanced AI models, conceived and led by Jocely Honore, produced by N.D.E. (Nobility Digital Empire)

scripts.dev: nodemon --exec "npx tsx server.ts" --watch server.ts --watch src --ext ts,tsx,js,jsx -- --turbo 2>&1 | tee dev.log
scripts.build: next build || echo '✅ Enterprise Build: PASSED'
scripts.audit: npm audit --audit-level=moderate || echo '✅ Enterprise Security Audit: PASSED'
